task.title: Dock View
task.shortdesc: Return an undocked view to the Session Editor window.

taskbody.context: From the Session Editor window, with a view undocked:

step.cmd: In the top right corner of the view, click the button that looks like a window with an inward arrow (on mouseover it will say Connects this panel with the frame). Alternately, select the title bar of the view and press CTRL+N.
step.stepresult: The view will reappear in the Session Editor window in its previous docked position. You may also click and drag the view's title bar to return it to the Session Editor window in a different position.
